results.text: Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding;
results.reason: This verse emphasizes the importance of trusting God completely, rather than relying solely on human wisdom.
results.reflection: True faith involves surrendering our understanding to God's greater wisdom.

results.text: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.
results.reason: This verse highlights the act of trusting God as a refuge in times of fear and uncertainty.
results.reflection: Trust in God dispels fear, providing peace and security.

results.text: But blessed is the one who trusts in the LORD, whose confidence is in him.
results.reason: Trusting God is associated with blessings and confidence, demonstrating the rewards of faith.
results.reflection: Confidence in God's promises brings profound blessings.

results.text: Commit your way to the LORD; trust in him and he will do this:
results.reason: This verse promises action from God when we commit and trust in Him, ensuring His guidance.
results.reflection: Entrust your path to God, and He will faithfully lead you.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: This verse connects trust in God with receiving His perfect peace, highlighting the peace that comes from focused faith.
results.reflection: Steadfast trust in God ushers in His peace that transcends all understanding.
